description: Caught in the Empire City Blast, triggered by Cole MacGrath and orchestrated by Kessler
Murdered by the First Sons on orders from Kessler
Murdered by a Dust Man Conduit on orders from Alden Tate
Torn apart by the vortex created by Cole MacGrath destroying the Ray Sphere (later reborn as the Beast)
Murdered by Reapers on orders from Sasha
Murdered by the Beast (undone by Kessler's time travel)
Thrown off a building by Kessler
